entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus

text: “Tracking and tracing will allow us to get R down, and hold R down, and so it will allow us to lift lockdown measures.” – Health Secretary @MattHancock at yesterday’s #coronavirus press conference https://t.co/vAsMg3UJKy
